channel.title: Items going into wrong equipment position?
channel.description:
Hey,
So I have added a couple of things to my server. I do the add models, all that, everything seems to work fine and dandy. I click on them in my inventory, (Bandos platelegs), and instead of them going onto my (obviously) legs, they go into my hand, and glitch on top of whatever I'm wearing in my legs slot currently.
Info: 317. Not sure what base exactly.
help please?
THANKS!!!
SGT

item.title: Items going into wrong equipment position?
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

I Vain I:

Bluur is a client, we’re trying to determine the source.

How could I go about that?

Read full topic

item.title: Items going into wrong equipment position?
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

I Vain I:

Can you please name a few packages and classes? This may help to determine the base.

Just checked, its a bluurs base!

Read full topic

item.title: Items going into wrong equipment position?
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

[quote=“BitchPk, post:3, topic:383684”][quote author=Sir Ego link=topic=479452.msg3510216#msg3510216 date=1298498373]
Im pretty sure in the code you added that there is a variable representing which slot it is equipted in. Play around with the number till you get it.
[/quote]

uhhh no.

oke if u got delta go to item.java and searsh for plate legs add them item ID after it

if u got a Project Insanty (PI) add it in itemAssist.java[/quote]

I don’t have it placed into sections. I don’t believe I have itemassist.java either.

I definitely don’t have equipment editor.dat (If I did, where would it be?)

Read full topic
